content.description1: IT Administrator experienced in managing networks and systems (AD, Proxmox), enhancing security, automating tasks (PowerShell), and building web applications. Currently pursuing a Master's degree in Computer Science at Politechnika Warszawska.
content.description2: Passionate about creating efficient IT solutions and intuitive web applications. Specialized in system administration, virtualization, and full-stack development with a focus on practical, user-centered solutions.
